top.title: US immigration chief Bovino set to leave Minneapolis after deadly shooting
top.summary: "Border tsar" Tom Homan will instead lead on-the-ground efforts in the Minnesota city after tensions escalated.

top.title: 'We're all terrified', Minnesotan tells the BBC in tears
top.summary: The BBC's Ana Faguy speaks to residents in the state after the second fatal shooting by federal immigration officers.

top.title: India and EU set to announce landmark trade deal
top.summary: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

top.title: Instagram, Facebook and WhatsApp to trial premium subscriptions
top.summary: Under the plan, access to Meta platforms' core services would remain free to use.

top.title: Tech giants face landmark trial over social media addiction claims
top.summary: Defendants include Meta, which owns Instagram and Facebook, TikTok's owner ByteDance and YouTube parent Google.

top.title: Google to pay $68m to settle lawsuit claiming it recorded private conversations
top.summary: The claimants say Google Assistant recorded private conversations without their knowledge.
